scripts.test: gulp && git status | grep 'working directory clean' >/dev/null || (echo 'Please commit all changes generated by building'; exit 1)
scripts.clean: [ -d bower_components/ ] && rm -dr bower_components/; [ -d build/ ] && rm -dr build/; [ -d node_modules/ ] && rm -dr node_modules/; echo 'folders cleaned'; echo '';
scripts.fresh-setup: npm run clean; npm run setup;
scripts.setup: npm install && bower install && gulp build
